title: Every Other Inch a Lady cinema slide
brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape and internal black frame. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Every Other Inch a Lady’ featuring Lana Turner distributed by Metro Goldwyn Mayer Pictures Ltd. Several pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details

group_siblings.title: A Bill of Divorcement cinema slide
group_siblings.creator_credit: RKO Radio Pictures and George Cukor
group_siblings.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
